title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.6 - Operator training and certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.6 - Operator training and certification

State Regulations
(a) No cremation unit subject to the
requirements of this subpart is permitted to operate unless it is operated
under the onsite supervision of a person possessing a valid crematory operator
certification issued by the department. (b) Crematory operator certifications issued
pursuant to this Section shall be valid for a period of five years from the
date of issuance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-4.6

Amended

New

York State Register March 4, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 9, eff. 3/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
